description: A multi-ensemble of at 6 simulations with standard and high resolution model configurations forced with high, medium and low radiative forcing scenarios (RCP8.5, RCP7.0, RCP4.5).
name: RCP85RCP70RCP45atHighAndStandardRes

ensembleAxis.description: An ensemble of three simulations forced high, medium and low radiative forcing scenarios.
ensembleAxis.name: High Med Low Radiative Forcing
ensembleAxis.longName: Three member ensemble of high, medium and low radiative forcing scenarios
ensembleAxis.keywords: three, 3, ensemble, radiative forcing, high, medium, low, scenario

ensembleAxis.description: At least two simulations, one at high resolution (minimum 25-50 km at mid-latitudes), and one at the standard model resolution
ensembleAxis.name: HighAndStandardResolution
ensembleAxis.longName: At least two members, one high resolution and one standard resolution
ensembleAxis.keywords: high resolution, standard resolution, at least two members

longName: high and standard resolutions of high, medium and low radiative forcing scenarios
keywords: radiative forcing ensemble, model resolution ensemble
